content: baby blankets are the perfect gift for an expectant parent this one is the perfect size for a stroller or crib - not too big so it won t get caught up in wheels or drag on the ground knit & crochet versions included in the one pattern materials yarn same for either version baby cotton color by lang yarns 100% cotton 50g 1 75oz 180m 196yds 3 balls crochet blanket is colour rainbow 079 knitblanket is colour water lily 151 crochet version 3 5 mm hook gauge 20 double_crochet = 4 size 21 wide x 27 long ** erratum for crochet version the end of row 1 and every row should say ch3 knit version 3 5 mm us 4 needles gauge 24 sts = 4 in stocking stitch size 20 wide x 27 long
